name: @elambro/extract-css-media-queries
description: A webpack plugin which extracts media queries from your css into separate files

scripts.minify: minify ./dist/index.js -d ./dist && minify ./dist/load-options.js -d ./dist && minify ./dist/handle-apply.js -d ./dist && minify ./dist/split-by-media-query.js -d ./dist/matches-queries.js && minify ./dist/splitByMediaQueryNew/matchMedia.js -d ./dist/splitByMediaQueryNew && minify ./dist/splitByMediaQueryOld/index.js -d ./dist/splitByMediaQueryOld && minify ./dist/splitByMediaQueryOld/matchMedia.js -d ./dist/splitByMediaQueryOld
scripts.build: npm run transpile && npm run minify

author: Erin Lambroschini
